---

## User Story Title
**As:**
User
  
**I want to:**
Action
  
**so that:**
Outcome

## User Story Cases
When I do... | The expected outcome is...
-------------|--------------
Action A | Outcome A
Action B | Outcome B
Action C | Outcome C

**Estimated Time (hours) [1,2,3,5,8,13]**  
e.g. 5
